titles.title: Boost for Child Care Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the dependent care tax credit, to accelerate the child tax credit, and to promote dependent care assistance programs.
Boost for Child Care Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: A Boost for Child Care Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the child care credit to: (1) expand the credit by revising the definition of the applicable percentage; and (2) accelerate the increase to a $1,000 credit.Directs the Secretary of Labor to establish a program promote awareness of the use of dependent care assistance programs.
